randomized_exam.description: Example request for a randomized exam (questions are selected randomly)
notes: When isRandomized is true, questionIdsWithMarks should be null
sectionId can be null for course-level exams
examStartTime and examEndTime should be in ISO 8601 format (UTC)

non_randomized_exam.description: Example request for a non-randomized exam (specific questions with custom marks)

request.title: Final Exam - Advanced Physics
request.description: Final examination with selected questions from section 3

notes: When isRandomized is false, questionIdsWithMarks is required
Each question ID (Guid) maps to its mark (decimal)
The sum of all marks in questionIdsWithMarks should equal examTotalMark

field_descriptions.courseId: Required. The ID of the course this exam belongs to (Guid)
field_descriptions.sectionId: Optional. The ID of the section if this is a section-specific exam (Guid?). Set to null for course-level exams
field_descriptions.createdBy: Required. The ID of the instructor creating this exam (Guid)
field_descriptions.title: Required. The title/name of the exam (string)
field_descriptions.numberOfQuestions: Required. Number of questions in the exam (int). Must match available questions in course/section
field_descriptions.examTotalMark: Required. Total marks for the exam (int)
field_descriptions.passMarkPercentage: Required. Minimum percentage required to pass (int, 0-100)
field_descriptions.examStartTime: Required. When the exam becomes available (DateTimeOffset, ISO 8601 format)
field_descriptions.examEndTime: Required. When the exam closes (DateTimeOffset, ISO 8601 format)
field_descriptions.durationInMinutes: Required. How long students have to complete the exam (int)
field_descriptions.isRandomized: Required. If true, questions are randomly selected. If false, use questionIdsWithMarks (bool)
field_descriptions.questionIdsWithMarks: Optional. Dictionary of question IDs to their marks. Required if isRandomized is false (Dictionary<Guid, decimal>?)
